alert.note: Alert for Hockley; Terry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 7:45PM CST until January 30 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...A light glazing of ice is expected on sidewalks and roadways. * WHERE...Hockley and Terry Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to Noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Ice accumulation on power lines and tree limbs may cause some power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or for the latest Texas road conditions visit drivetexas.org
